name: Intro
commands: Wa... up...|Are ... list...?|Lor... Sage...|Lord Sages...|LORD SAGES!
Doesn't want to go to bed, doesn't want to wake up.|There's no pleasing you, is there?
Okay, okay. Look. I'm ready! Honest!
Alright, well, seems like most of the others have gone ahead.
Alright, well, I've been ready for too long.
Because you overslept for three hours!|I tried to wake you, but nothing!
Wait, you've been trying for THREE HOURS?

Well, I gave up at thirty minutes.|Browsed the local vendors, had breakfast.|Tried my hand at fishing, failed at fishing...|{c:expression;Sal;CloseEyes}Apologised to the villagers for causing a scene after breaking my rod...|{c:expression;Sal;NormalBlink}Anyway, the point is...{c:wait;400} THREE HOURS!
Okay, okay.|Look I'll just check in with whoever's here, and we'll leave together, okay?
I'm feeling well... *COUGH*.|...|Ok, I've felt better...
I'm sure that you know of the affairs in Aurelia.
What do you think of them?
If you're asking whether I believe you ordered it?|I do not.
Duh! Everyone's so dumb!|Pops couldn't hurt a fly!
Still, the stained reputation we're experiencing...|At the behest of someone who has it out for us...|I wonder how this was orchestrated.
Indeed, none of our envoy could have been in on it.|It wouldn't escape my eye.
Uh, well what's the point in speculating if we don't have all the details?
A valid point, son.|Though my personal theory is Monsdor.|They stand to gain a lot from currying favour with Aurelia.
A country with a proud military force...|They would enjoy instigating a war, whilst also not facing the backlash of warmongering...
Like I said, fellows. Speculation.|C'mon! Your son is back! Lighten the mood!
I'll... think of something.|Once... the dizziness... goes...
It'll pass.|Why don't you have a wander around, get to know your new allies better?
He'll have to learn.|But let's hope it doesn't come to that.
